pubspec.name: watcher
pubspec.description: A file system watcher. It monitors changes to contents of directories and sends notifications when files have been added, removed, or modified.
A file watcher. It monitors (currently by polling) for changes to contents of directories and notifies you when files have been added, removed, or modified.
pubspec.author: Dart Team <misc@dartlang.org>
